treatment-md.title: Chilicola (Heteroediscelis) mavida Toro & Moldenke 1979
treatment-md.article-title: A revision of Chilicola (Heteroediscelis), a subgenus of xeromelissine bees (Hymenoptera, Colletidae) endemic to Chile: taxonomy, phylogeny, and biogeography, with descriptions of eight new species
